author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Logitech International Sees ‍$310 Mln To $320 Mln In Non-Gaap Operating Income For 2019​
text:
March 5 (Reuters) - Logitech International Sa:
* SEES ‍FISCAL YEAR 2019 OUTLOOK OF HIGH SINGLE-DIGIT SALES GROWTH IN CONSTANT CURRENCY​
* SEES ‍$310 MILLION TO $320 MILLION IN NON-GAAP OPERATING INCOME FOR 2019​
* LOGITECH - ‍REAFFIRMS FISCAL YEAR 2018 OUTLOOK OF 12 TO 14 PERCENT SALES GROWTH IN CONSTANT CURRENCY AND $270 MILLION TO $280 MILLION IN NON-GAAP OPERATING INCOME​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
